metadata.title: CVE-2018-20230 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PSPP 1.2.0. There is a heap-based buffer overflow at the function read_bytes_internal in utilities/pspp-dump-sav.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: pspp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-5').
